## Figure 1

```{r}
library(funcgeo)
library(grid)

grid.draw(f)
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(flip(f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(flip(f)))
```

## Figure 2

```{r}
grid.draw(above(f, f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(beside(f, f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(above(beside(f, f), f))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(f, angle = 45))
```

## Man

http://www.frank-buss.de/lisp/functional.html

```{r}
grid.draw(man)
```

```{r}
grid.draw(beside(man, man))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(above(man, man))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(rot(man))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(quartet(man, man, man, man))
```

```{r}
grid.draw(cycle(man, man, man, man))
```
